title: MOTION (LEE - BLUMENFIELD) relative to funding for additional police services within the Los Angeles Police Department (LAPD) Toganga Division in Council District (CD) 12.

appearances.recommendation: TRANSFER and APPROPRIATE $75,000 in the CD 12 line item General City Purposes Fund No. 100/56, Account No. 000A28, to the Police Fund No. 100/70, Account No. 1092 (Overtime - Police Officers), to be used for additional police services within Topanga Division, CD 12. AUTHORIZE the City Clerk and the LAPD to make any corrections, clarifications or revisions to the above fund transfer instructions, including any new instructions, in order to effectuate the intent of this Motion, and including any corrections and changes to fund or account numbers; said corrections / clarifications / changes may be made orally, electronically, or by any other means. Motion (Lee - Blumenfield) dated 10-29-25
